title: Relaxing Lavender
description: Indulge in the soothing aroma of lavender with this high-quality scented candle. Perfect for creating a calming atmosphere and promoting relaxation.

title: Fresh Linen
description: Bring the scent of fresh laundry into your home with this delightful fresh linen candle. Enjoy the clean and comforting fragrance that will uplift your space.

title: Exotic Sandalwood
description: Experience the rich and warm fragrance of sandalwood with this exotic candle. Let the captivating scent transport you to a place of tranquility and serenity.

title: Vanilla Bean
description: Immerse yourself in the sweet and creamy scent of vanilla with this vanilla bean candle. Fill your home with warmth and coziness, creating a welcoming atmosphere.

title: Citrus Burst
description: Infuse your space with a burst of refreshing citrus fragrance with this invigorating candle. Energize your surroundings and uplift your mood with its zesty notes.
